title: User-Centered Design Strategies for Virtual Learning Environment Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Proficiency in Digital Tools, Understanding of Domain-Specific (Science) Fundamental Concepts
context.additional_context: A course for acquiring core principles and practical techniques needed to develop virtual learning environments in smartphone-centric limited-technology settings

learning_goals: Learners can plan a prototype of a mobile-optimized virtual learning environment based on user-centered design principles
Learners can propose three or more interactive elements that enhance user engagement when designing virtual spaces
Learners can create guidelines for designing 3D virtual spaces implementable in limited technological environments (smartphones)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
